lki.lang.name: English
lki.app.title: LK I18n Installer
lki.game.install_hint: (Use the checkboxes to select one or more instances for installation.)
lki.advanced.please_select: To configure an instance, click its name in the 'Game' tab.
lki.advanced.confirm_type_change:
Are you sure you want to change the instance type to %s?

This will not affect your game client, but it will determine which localization package is installed for this instance.
lki.settings.language.restart_required: You must restart the application to apply this change.
lki.proxy.title: Proxy Settings
lki.proxy.error.host_port_required: Host and Port are required when using a manual proxy.
lki.preset.default.name: Default
lki.preset.manager.title: Manage Presets
lki.preset.manager.tooltip_open_mods_dir: Open local l10n mods folder for this instance
lki.preset.manager.tooltip_download_mods: Visit the l10n mods download page for the selected localization
lki.preset.manager.enter_name: Enter a name for the new preset:
lki.preset.manager.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this preset?
lki.preset.error.name_exists: A preset with this name already exists.
lki.add_instance.title: Add Instance
lki.add_instance.name: Instance Name:
lki.add_instance.error.invalid_path: Invalid path. Please ensure the path points to a game root directory containing [①Korabli.exe/WorldOfWarships.exe ②bin/ folder ③game_info.xml or steam_api64.dll].
lki.add_instance.error.empty_fields: Name, Path, and Type cannot be empty.
lki.add_instance.error.path_exists: An instance with this path already exists.
lki.detect.no_new: No new game instances were found.
lki.edit_instance.title: Edit Instance
lki.edit_instance.name: Instance Name:
lki.delete_instance.title: Remove Instance
lki.delete_instance.prompt:
Are you sure you want to remove this instance? This action cannot be undone.

Please note, this will not delete the game itself.
lki.delete_instance.confirm_label: To confirm, please type the full name of the instance:
lki.delete_instance.error.mismatch: Name does not match. Removal cancelled.
